root.text: This workshop improves the student’s knowledge and gives basic information about sensors. It makes us informed about the sending and receiving signals by sensors. LabView software will be taught and construction and functioning of a Lego robot will be taught.

After a really interactive session about sensors and its types and working, there will be a practical session in which different experiments will performed and taught to the students for improving their knowledge on sensors and their interface.

text: 9:00 AM - 10:30 AM - Theory session – I ( sensors functions and its applications).
10:45 AM – 12:15 PM - Theory session – II (LAB-VIEW Software)
